Subject: SSLSplit.exe crashing on 10 % of machines.
Description: SSLSplit.exe crashing on 10 % of machines in ZS environment having EPP client version 6.2.2.1 with Stealthy DPI enabled. As per our Monitoring team, on EPP version 5.9.3.5 it was crashing on just 1% of the machines. However, with new version and stealthy DPI enablement it has jumped to 10%. General trend that is observed is it is crashing just one time on each affected machine in one week.
Solution_Comment__c: The customer confirmed that we can close this ticket after we updated to 5941.
